concept.title: PA/PR Interface Switching area
concept.shortdesc: The PA/PR Interface Switching area is in the top left corner of the main interface.

conbody.p: Click corresponding icon in this area, and switch to the PA/PR interface quickly

li.p: Click PA shortcut keys (Note 1 in Figure 3-2) to jump to the PA interface from PR, Exam, Viewing, Scan, Filming or any other interfaces.
Click PR shortcut keys (Note 2 in Figure 3-2) to jump to the PR interface from PA, Exam, Viewing, Scan, Filming or any other interfaces.
